extendedInfo.description: Truly Divine & highly customizable Jai Hanuman Aarti & 3D Temple Arti  3D Temple (Mandir) Free Application.Get the feeling of a real Temple with Live Diya & functional Incense (AgarBatti), with your preferred high quality & spectacular Shri Jai Hanuman Idol and real temple like surroundings, ringing bell, flower basket, shankh, rotating Peace Chakra & Jai Hanuman Mantra etc.How to install:Home -> Press Menu -> Select Arti s -> Select Arti App -> Select Jai Hanuman Temple 3D Arti App from the listTouch on Gold Plate to start Aarti animation along with flower offering animation & Jai Hanuman Mantra with Temple Bell & Shank sound in the back ground.A must have app for the Al-mighty Bhagwan Jai Hanuman follower & someone who believes in his powers.Personalize your mobile with the divinity of Jai Hanuman Aarti & 3D Temple using our Shri Jai Hanuman Ji Arti .Ring the temple bell with a single touch & offer your prayer with the Animated Flowers offering with a single touch on the flower basket.Customization Features Available in this Jai Hanuman Aarti & 3D Temple Arti App are:Go to Settings:1: Select Preferred Jai Hanuman Idol2: Set Mantra looping Count3: Select Small or Large Diya4: Enable/disable Incense, Diya, Shankh & Flower basket5: Turn On or Off Flower Animation6: Enable or disable Touch & Sound Effects7: Share the app with your friends or relatives on social media through Facebook, twitter etc.  & much More.Jai Hanuman of Shirdi (died October 15, 1918), also known as Jai Hanuman, was an Indian guru, yogi, and fakir who is regarded by his devotees as a saint. Many devotees â including Hemadpant, who wrote the famous Shri Sai Satcharitra â consider him an incarnation of Lord Krishna[1] while other devotees consider him as an incarnation of Lord Dattatreya. Many devotees believe that he was a Satguru. No verifiable information is available regarding Jai Hanuman's birth and place of birth. Jai Hanuman's real name is unknown. The name "Sai" was given to him upon his arrival at Shirdi, a town in the west Indian state of Maharashtra. Do you like to spend time in Temple and enchants the holy bhajans, aarti etc. Shri Jai Hanuman Arti  brings you the feeling of a realistic temple in front of you no matter where you are. Please do try our other apps to seek blessings of Lord Rama(Shri Ram) , Shri Krishna(Lord Krishna , Radhe Krishna) , Lord Shiva(Shiv Ji , Shankar Ji) , Lord Hanuman(Hanuman Ji) , Maa Laxmi(Goddess Laxmi), Maa Saraswati(Goddess Saraswati), Lord Vishnu(Vishnu Ji), Goddess Durga(Maa Durga), Shri Jai Hanuman(Jai Hanuman Aarti & 3D Temple, ) & many more.Need not to do TEMPLE RUN. Use our high quality Shri Jai Hanuman Ji 3D virtual temple app & get the blessings of Lord Jai Hanuman throughout the day.We ensure thoroughly tested & highly optimized Shri Jai Hanuman Arti App to ensure minimal resource (Battery & Memory) usage & alike user experience across range of devices.Like our Jai Hanuman Ji Arti  App? Please rate 5 Star. In case you have some concerns plz write back to us. We will ensure all your concerns are addressed in the future updates.This special Shri Jai Hanuman Arti App is freely available for download with search monetization. This very divine Lord Jai Hanuman Arti  app will add a few search access points on your device. If you do not want to use this new search page, you can either ignore or delete it. If you do use it, we get a few cents and it will help us a lot to keep developing more apps. If you donât, you can delete it and no harm is done (our Jai Hanuman Wall Paper app remains the same, no need to uninstall it!).We share data with a service provider, AppLovin Corporation. The use of your data by AppLovin is subject to AppLovin Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. Both policies are available at www.applovin.com***********************************************************
